data.text:
@BlindBlackBird_ Hello there. While we're always looking to improve services, we do have audio descriptions but may be limited on certain aircrafts. For assistance, please speak to a member of your flight crew. 

You can learn also more about this here: https://t.co/XSRkBkq6As. ^SZ

G'day, Brisbane, 🇦🇺! 

Now flying Down Under more than any other airline:
🐨San Francisco – Brisbane, Melbourne and Sydney
🐨Los Angeles – Melbourne and Sydney
🐨Houston – Sydney

Once you land, connect with our partner @VirginAustralia to explore more: https://t.co/9fAyfgIDPH https://t.co/9gTGzL5sjf
